Index.title: Science for your body, coaching for your life

hero.title: Science for your body,
hero.description: Nutrition and anthropometry with a human approach, designed to help you understand your body and sustain changes over time.

coaching.title: Why does
coaching.description: A plan doesn't work if it doesn't fit into your life. I work on habits, context, and your relationship with food so the process is possible, realistic, and sustainable.

habit.title: Habit Management
habit.description: Practical support to incorporate changes that last over time.

emotional.title: Emotional Approach
emotional.description: Understanding how, when, and why you eat is also part of the process.

deliverable1.title: Monthly Action Plan
deliverable1.description: Clear objectives, energy requirements, and simple guidelines adapted to your current situation.

deliverable2.title: Visual Meal Guide
deliverable2.description: Portions, combinations, and exchanges explained in a clear and flexible way.

deliverable3.title: Follow-up and Adjustments
deliverable3.description: Review of the process, sensations, adherence, and, if applicable, anthropometric measurements.

services.title: Services designed for
services.description: Combines science, empathy, and continuous follow-up to achieve changes that last over time.

service1.title: Changes â€” Habits and learning
service1.description: Process focused on learning to eat, improving your relationship with food, and building sustainable habits, without body measurements.

service2.title: Changes and Measurements
service2.description: In addition to habit work, we add anthropometric measurements to interpret your body evolution with real data.
service2.feature3: Adjustments based on progress and feelings

service3.title: Close Support
service3.description: A process with more support, more frequent contact, and continuous adjustments, ideal if you need more guidance and motivation.

calculator.title: Start with
calculator.description: An initial estimate to understand how much energy your body needs according to your context and goals.
calculator.point2: Ideal as a first step in the process

testimonials.title: Changes that
testimonials.description: Beyond the numbers, what matters is how you feel every day.

testimonial1.quote: I recovered my energy in training and learned to eat without anxiety. Julieta taught me that it's not about counting calories but understanding my body.
testimonial1.author: Martina R.

testimonial2.quote: I lost 18lbs in 4 months without going hungry. The best part was the emotional support, she didn't just give me a plan, she helped me change my mindset.
testimonial2.author: Lucas M.

testimonial3.quote: The ISAK assessment was eye-opening. Understanding my real body composition motivated me to follow the plan with discipline and the results were incredible.
testimonial3.author: Camila P.

cta.title: Your body deserves
cta.description: It's not about doing it perfectly, but about making it possible. I'll help you understand your body and build habits that last.
